tool_description: Use this  API to identify types of garbage. The images can be classified among 10 different types:
name: ReciclAPI - Garbage Detection
title: ReciclAPI - Garbage Detection

api_list.name: Classify Garbage Image
api_list.description:
Use this endpoint to identify a submitted image.
The returned result will be a set of the three most probable classes.

Images can be submitted under a **URL** or a **base64 encoding** format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reciclapi-garbage-detection.p.rapidapi.com/predict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reciclapi-garbage-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://reciclapi-garbage-detection.p.rapidapi.com/predict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
